en: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but prove the spirits, whether they are of God; because many false prophets are gone out into the world.
hmr: Dittakhai, thlarau nazawng chu ring naw ro, amiruokchu, thlarauhai chu Pathiena inthawk an ni le ni naw infie ro; thuhriltu tehlêm tamtak khawvêlah an hung suok ta leiin.

en: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God: every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:
hmr: Hi hin Pathien Thlarau chu hrieng in tih; thlarau iengkhawm Isu Krista tisaah a hung inchang ti ṭan chu Pathiena inthawk a nih; thlarau iengkhawm Isu ṭan naw chu Pathiena inthawk a ni nawh.

en: and every spirit that confesseth not Jesus is not of God: and this is the spirit of the antichrist, whereof ye have heard that it cometh; and now it is in the world already.
hmr: Chu chu Krista kaltu thlarau, a hung ding in hriet kha a nih; tu khawm hin khawvêlah a um zing tah a nih.

en: Ye are of God, my little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you than he that is in the world.
hmr: Nauhai, Pathiena inthawk in na, chuong chu in hne tah, nangnia um chu khawvêla um nêk chun a ropui lem leiin.

en: They are of the world: therefore speak they as of the world, and the world heareth them.
hmr: Anni chu khawvêla mi an na, chuleiin khawvêla mi angin an ṭawng a, khawvêlin an thu an ngai hlak a nih.

en: We are of God: he that knoweth God heareth us; he who is not of God heareth us not. By this we know the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.
hmr: Eini Pathiena inthawk ei na; Pathien hretu chun ei thu a ngai hlak a, Pathiena inthawka mi ni lo chun ei thu a ngai ngai nawh. Chuonga chun thlarau indiktak le indiknaw ei hriet a nih.

en: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is begotten of God, and knoweth God.
hmr: Dittakhai, inhmangai tuo seng ei tiu; hmangaina hi Pathiena inthawka suok a ni sih a; mi tin, hmangaina nei taphawt chu Pathien inei an ni tah a, Pathien an hriet bawk a.

en: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.
hmr: Hmangaina nei naw chun Pathien a hriet nawh; Pathien chu hmangaina a ni sih a.

en: Herein was the love of God manifested in us, that God hath sent his only begotten Son into the world that we might live through him.
hmr: Hitaka hin Pathien hmangaina ei chungah a hung inlang tah, ama leia ei hring theina dinga Pathienin a Naupa nei sun khawvêla a hung tira hin.

en: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
hmr: Hitaka hin hmangaina a um, einin Pathien ei hmangai ka ti a ni nawh a, amain a mi hmangai a, ei suolhai thuphachawina ni dingin a Naupa a hung tir ka ti lem a nih.

en: Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.
hmr: Dittakhai, Pathienin chuong ang lâwma a mi hmangai chun, eini khawm ei inhmangai tuo seng ding a nih.

en: No man hath beheld God at any time: if we love one another, God abideth in us, and his love is perfected in us:
hmr: Tûkhawmin ienglai khawmin Pathien an hmu ngai nawh. Ei inhmangai tuo chun Pathien einiah um zing a ta, a hmangaina khawm einiah famkim bawk a tih.

en: hereby we know that we abide in him and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.
hmr: Amaah ei um zing le ama chu einiah a um zing ti hitaka hin ei hriet, a thlarau a mi pêk ta lei hin.

en: And we have beheld and bear witness that the Father hath sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world.
hmr: Chun, Pain Naupa chu khawvêl sandamtua um dingin a hungtir ti ei hmu tah a, ei inhriettir a nih.

en: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God abideth in him, and he in God.
hmr: Tûkhawm, “Isu hi Pathien Nau- pa a nih,” tia ṭan taphawt chu, amaa chun Pathien a um zing a, ama khawm chu Pathienah a um zing bawk a nih.

en: And we know and have believed the love which God hath in us. God is love; and he that abideth in love abideth in God, and God abideth in him.
hmr: Pathienin einia hmangaina a inei chu ei hriet a, ei awi bawk a nih. Pathien chu hmangaina a nih, hmangainaa um zing chu Pathienah a um zing a, Pathien khawm amaah a um zing a nih.

en: Herein is love made perfect with us, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment; because as he is, even so are we in this world.
hmr: Hitaka hin ei chungah hma- ngaina a famkim tah; rorêl nia ṭi loa ei um theia hin; ama um anga khawvêla hin ei um leiin.

en: There is no fear in love: but perfect love casteth out fear, because fear hath punishment; and he that feareth is not made perfect in love.
hmr: Hmangainaa chun ṭitna hrim a um nawh; hmangaina famkimin ṭitna a hnawt suok lem hlak a nih, ṭitnaa chun hremna a um sih a; a ṭitu chu hmangainaah a la famkim naw a nih.

en: We love, because he first loved us.
hmr: Amain a mi hmangai hmasak leiin ei hmangai a nih:

en: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, cannot love God whom he hath not seen.
hmr: Miin, “Pathien ka hmangai,” tiin a unau theida si sienla, ama chu khêlinhlip a nih; a unau a ihmu zing ta hman a hmangai naw chun, Pathien a ihmu ngai naw chu iengtin am hmangai thei a ta?

en: And this commandment have we from him, that he who loveth God love his brother also.
hmr: Ama kuoma inthawkin hi thupêk hi ei nei “Tukhawmin Pathien a hmangai chun a unau khawm a hmangai bawk ding a nih,” ti hi.
